images.alt: Two transparent glass dropper bottles with golden caps and white droppers, one small and one slightly larger, displayed on a plain white background. The bottles are empty, showcasing their clear design and minimalist aesthetic suitable for cosmetic or essential oil packaging.

Three identical clear glass dropper bottles with gold caps and white droppers arranged in a row on a soft beige background. The image has a clean, minimal, and cinematic aesthetic, ideal for showcasing premium cosmetic or essential oil packaging.

A woman smiling while applying facial serum to her cheek using a glass dropper with a gold cap. She holds an open clear bottle in her other hand against a plain beige background, representing skincare or cosmetic product usage.

A labeled product image showing the components of a clear glass dropper bottle with a gold cap and white dropper. The image highlights the bottle, dropper, and plug, with close-up views of the bottle neck. Text explains that the plug prevents leakage and wipes off excess product.

A 15ml clear glass dropper bottle with a gold cap and white dropper shown on a light pink background. The image highlights the bottle’s dimensions 8.5 cm height and 2.5 cm width with the label “Size & Capacity” displayed below.
